Key Match Events: Harry Kane scored the opening goal for England in the 18th minute
Morten Hjulmand equalized for Denmark in the 34th minute
Post-Match Reflections: Harry Kane acknowledged England's performance was lacklustre
Morten Hjulmand expressed disappointment at not securing a win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Deutsche Bank Park in Frankfurt, Germany
Others: Gareth Southgate made substitutions to inject fresh legs and energy into the team
England take on Slovenia in their final group game on Tuesday, while the Danes face Serbia on the same day
